name: AlternativeID
description: The AlternativeID class lists the incident tracking numbers used by CSIRTs, other than the one generating the document, to refer to the identical activity described the IODEF document.  A tracking number listed as an AlternativeID references the same incident detected by

IncidentID.name: IncidentID
IncidentID.description: The incident tracking number of another CSIRT.

restriction.name: restriction
restriction.description: This attribute has been defined in Section 3.2.
